text: Question: *is there a way to do conditional fields in such a way that if _value_ is greater than 1  — show the field?*
Basic jist I have a module which has a number field. that determines the number of other fields that should display. I don’t want to use a repeater for this
Can you get alternate language versions of a page in HubL?
not sure what you mean but you can detect a query param in the url using hubl and display different content yes
I mean like, if I've got a page that has English and Spanish versions, can I get the URL of the Spanish version from the English version?
